Tacit Talk is a programming podcast hosted by two NVIDIA software engineers that focuses on the C++ and Rust programming languages. Topics discussed include algorithms, data structures, programming languages, latest news in tech and more. The podcast was initially inspired by Magic Read Along. Feel free to follow us on Twitter at @adspthepodcast.

The host is:

Conor Hoekstra

Twitter: @code_report

Conor (he/him) is a Research Scientist at NVIDIA working on array programming models and languages. He is extremely passionate about programming languages, algorithms and beautiful code. He is the founder and organizer of the Programming Languages Virtual Meetup, he has a YouTube channel and is the host of three podcasts:

  • ArrayCast (a podcast about array languages)
  • ADSP (this podcast)
  • RUN FOR THE FUN OF IT! (a running podcast)

Conor is also an avid conference speaker. You can find all of Conorâ€™s conference talks and podcast appearances (on other podcasts) here.
